markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Morrigna](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3149)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Bounty hunters and investigators, morrignas seek out creatures who thwart death or interfere with the natural flow of souls. Morrignas dress in flowing spider silk and wear masks reminiscent of webs, as they consider patient and watchful spiders to be their spiritual kin.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Monitor](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 34

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Morrigna.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Morrigna](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3149)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Monitor" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=655" />
<trait label="Psychopomp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=679" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 276 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +28; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=67) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114), [Diabolic](/Languages.aspx?ID=117), [Empyrean](/Languages.aspx?ID=115), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34); [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1680), [_truespeech_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1728)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Boneyard Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +28, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +29, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +29, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +24, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** +3

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2829) [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=372)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 38 

**Fort** +25 

**Ref** +27 

**Will** +29 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 240

, regeneration 20 (deactivated by [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=524) or [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604))

</row>

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578)

**Resistances**
[poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) 15, [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510) 15

**Wrappings Lash** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature within reach of the morrigna's web wrappings uses an action to Strike or attempt a skill check; **Effect** The morrigna makes a web wrappings Strike against the triggering creature. If the strike is a critical hit, the triggering action is disrupted.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_bo staff_ +31 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 2d8+14 bludgeoning plus 4d6 shepherd's touch

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
web wrappings +29 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+14 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45) and 4d6 shepherd's touch

**Divine Spontaneous Spells** DC 35, attack +30
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307), [Vitality Lash](/Spells.aspx?ID=1744), [Void Warp](/Spells.aspx?ID=1745)
- **1st**
[Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [Enfeeble](/Spells.aspx?ID=1513) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Calm](/Spells.aspx?ID=1458), [See the Unseen](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Crisis of Faith](/Spells.aspx?ID=55), [Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Dispelling Globe](/Spells.aspx?ID=1494), [Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247), [Unfettered Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732) (4 slots)
- **5th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Scouting Eye](/Spells.aspx?ID=1661), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272) (4 slots)
- **6th**
[Field of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=114), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) (4 slots)

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 37
- **4th**
[Talking Corpse](/Spells.aspx?ID=329)
- **Constant (5th)**
[Truespeech](/Spells.aspx?ID=1728), [Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293)

**Rituals** DC 37

- **5th**
[Call Spirit](/Rituals.aspx?ID=5)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=55)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127)) A morrigna can take the appearance of any Small or Medium animal or humanoid. This doesn't change their Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it might change the damage type their Strikes deal. Unless they choose to manifest their web wrappings in their new form, they cannot make web wrappings Strikes.

**Shepherd's Touch**   A morrigna's Strikes have the benefit of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2840) property rune and deal an additional 4d6 void damage to living creatures or 4d6 vitality damage to undead.

**Spider Minions** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Summon](/Traits.aspx?ID=520)) The morrigna summons a [giant tarantula](/Monsters.aspx?ID=387) (page 321) or [spider swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=385). These spiders have the [summoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=706) trait and remain for 10 minutes or until reduced to 0 Hit Points, whichever comes first. The morrigna does not need to Sustain the Spell to direct these summoned creatures, and the morrigna can have any number of summoned spiders in existence at once. The morrigna can see through the eyes of any of their summoned spiders at any time.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-458" />
name: Morrigna

Morrignas dress in flowing spider silk and wear masks reminiscent of webs, as they consider patient and watchful spiders to be their spiritual kin. This doesn't change their Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it might change the damage type their Strikes deal. Unless they choose to manifest their web wrappings in their new form, they cannot make web wrappings Strikes. Shepherd's Touch A morrigna's Strikes have the benefit of a ghost touch property rune and deal an additional 4d6 void damage to living creatures or 4d6 vitality damage to undead. Spider Minions Three Actions (Divine, Summon) The morrigna summons a giant tarantula (page 321) or spider swarm. These spiders have the summoned trait and remain for 10 minutes or until reduced to 0 Hit Points, whichever comes first. The morrigna does not need to Sustain the Spell to direct these summoned creatures, and the morrigna can have any number of summoned spiders in existence at once. The morrigna can see through the eyes of any of their summoned spiders at any time.
